title: Provider Runtime State Schema
description: Schema for validating the structure of provider data, including runtime state.

provider_url.description: Base URL for the provider's API.

streamingCompatible.description: Whether the provider natively supports streaming responses.

models.description: Map of model IDs to their runtime state.

disabled.description: Flag indicating if the provider is automatically disabled due to consecutive errors.

avg_response_time.description: Overall average response time across models (ms, EMA).

avg_provider_latency.description: Overall average provider latency across models (ms, EMA).

errors.description: Total errors encountered for this provider.

provider_score.description: Overall calculated score for the provider (0-100).

id.description: Model identifier (matches the key in the parent map).

token_generation_speed.description: Default or calculated token generation speed (tokens/sec).

errors.description: Count of errors for this model within this provider.

consecutive_errors.description: Number of consecutive errors encountered for this model on this provider.

avg_response_time.description: Calculated average response time for this model (ms, EMA).

avg_provider_latency.description: Calculated average provider latency for this model (ms, EMA).

avg_token_speed.description: Calculated average token speed (tokens/sec, e.g., EMA).

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the response recording (epoch milliseconds).

response_time.description: Total time for the API call (ms).

provider_latency.description: Calculated latency attributable to the provider (ms).

observed_speed_tps.description: Observed speed (tokens/sec) for this specific request.

apiKey.description: API key of the user making the request.
